n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = max(x) - min(x) + 1
max_houses = n

for i in range(n):
    if x[i] == 1:
        max_houses -= 1
    elif x[i] == n:
        max_houses -= 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)

print("hello world")


n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = 1
max_houses = 1

for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] != x[i-1]:
        min_houses += 1
    if x[i] != x[i-1] + 1:
        max_houses += 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = 0
max_houses = 0

for i in range(n):
    if i == 0 or x[i] != x[i-1]:
        min_houses += 1
    if i == 0 or x[i] != x[i-1] and x[i] != x[i-1] + 1:
        max_houses += 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
